          <title>
            <string language="sl">Določitev konstante g</string>
            <string language="en">Determination of the constant g</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ermittlung des konstanten g</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détermination du g constant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinação do g constante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determinazione del g costante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσδιορισμός του σταθερού γ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determinación del g constante</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Ravninsko nihalo niha v polju z neznano velikostjo gravitacijskega pospeška.</string>
            <string language="en">Observing the planar pendulum in place where gravity constant is not known.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ravninsko nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">planar pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">konstanta g</string>
            <string language="en">g constant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gravitacijski pospešek</string>

          </keyword>

            <string language="sl">colos</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachten des planaren Pendels im Platz, in dem 
Schwerkraftkonstante nicht bekannt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Observant le pendule planaire en place où la 
constante de pesanteur n'est pas connue.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observando o pêndulo planar no lugar onde a 
constante da gravidade não é sabida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osservando il pendolo planare sul posto dove il 
costante di gravità non è conosciuto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρατήρηση του επίπεδου εκκρεμούς σε ισχύ όπου η 
σταθερά βαρύτητας δεν είναι γνωστή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Observación del péndulo planar en el lugar en 
donde la constante de la gravedad no se sabe.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">planares Pendel</string>
